description:
Rio terminal is a hardware-accelerated GPU terminal emulator, focusing to run in desktops and browsers.

Rio terminal is a hardware-accelerated GPU terminal emulator, focusing to run in desktops and browsers.
The supported platforms currently consist of BSD, Linux, MacOS and Windows.
- GPU memory usage drop 83%.
- Sync input render logic (macos).
Changelog
- ce76aa2 prepare v0.2.35
- d00f39c correct memory usage on changelog.md
- ebd5704 don't panic
- eed71da reduce gpu memory
- 4415d9e present_after_input
